categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Anya Foravis was a female Bakuran from the planet Bakura. Foravis served in the Bakuran military police and later joined the Imperial Navy. She was assigned to serve aboard the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Executor during the Galactic Civil War and shortly after the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, she was one of a group of Executor crewmen who were assigned to investigate the murder of Lieutenant Tanith Sorn.
